trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_SEQ_00<tab>Fufulupa needs you to assist his fellow Brass Blades.

TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_SEQ_01<tab>The Brass Blades of the Rose have been charged with guarding a party of thaumaturges surveying the Footfalls. Fearing that their security is inadequate, Fufulupa bids you speak with Totoruna at the ruins and offer your assistance.
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_SEQ_02<tab>Totoruna curtly informs you that his unit does not require aid. Fufulupa's gesture appears to be both unwarranted and unwanted...
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_FUFULUPA_000<tab>The Brass Blades of the Rose have need of your assistance once more, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_FUFULUPA_001<tab>Thaumaturges from the Ossuary are presently surveying the Footfalls for ancient relics.
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_FUFULUPA_002<tab>As the area is rife with wild beasts, the Horizon garrison has been charged with their security.

TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_FUFULUPA_003<tab>But Captain Baldewyn sent only a handful of Brass Blades! Despite his assurances to the contrary, such a small unit cannot possibly be sufficient to protect our patrons.
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_FUFULUPA_004<tab>I would have you offer your assistance to my comrades. Pray travel to the Footfalls and speak with Totoruna.
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_TOTORUNA_010<tab>A bleedin' 'venturer, come to help? I ain't heard nothin' from Cap'n Baldewyn 'bout this. He said trusted men only...
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_TOTORUNA_011<tab>Anyroad, we've got this under control─an' besides, this operation ain't got nothin' to do with Fufulupa.
TEXT_SUBWIL085_00333_TOTORUNA_012<tab>Boy's got a stick up his arse the size of a sabotender. It's no wonder the cap'n told him to stay at Horizon...
